title: 1979년 Brewster v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Brewster v. State. 판결일: 1979-01-29. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Cornell T. BREWSTER, Appellant, v. STATE of Missouri, Respondent
**판결일**: 1979-01-29
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: Shangler, Swof-Ford, Wasserstrom

## 변호인

Edward P. Cleary, Marshall, for appellant., John D. Ashcroft, Atty. Gen., Paul Robert Otto, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.

## 인용

- 577 S.W.2d 911

## 판결문 요약


577 S.W.2d 911 (1979)
Cornell T. BREWSTER, Appellant,
v.
STATE of Missouri, Respondent.
No. KCD 29224.
Missouri Court of Appeals, Western District.
January 29, 1979.
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer Denied February 26, 1979.
Application to Transfer Denied April 10, 1979.
*913 Edward P. Cleary, Marshall, for appellant.
John D. Ashcroft, Atty. Gen., Paul Robert Otto, Asst. Atty. Gen., Jefferson City, for respondent.
Before SHANGLER, P. J., and SWOFFORD, C. J., and WASSERSTROM, J.
Motion for Rehearing and/or Transfer to Supreme Court Denied February 26, 1979.
WASSERSTROM, Judge.
Defendant was convicted of first degree murder. This court affirmed that conviction on direct appeal in an opinion which sets forth the facts leading to and surrounding the homicide. State v. Brewster, 525 S.W.2d 427 (Mo.App.1975). Thereafter defendant filed a motion under Rule 27.26 to set aside the conviction. The trial court denied the motion, from which defendant appeals. We affirm.
In his brief, defendant raises ten points. The first nine of those relate to alleged ineffective assistance of counsel and all of those points will therefore be discussed together as one category under Section I of this opinion. Defendant's remaining point challenges the sufficiency of the trial court's findings of fact, and that point will be discussed under Section II of this opinion.

I.

Sufficiency of the Legal Representation
Defendant complains: (1) that his trial attorney failed to interview any witnesses prio...
